content: the wheat hat is a beautiful textured crochet hat worked from side to side in row this hat was designed to match the previously published wheat scarf 8 together they make a beautiful textured winter crochet set don t miss a thing subscribe to my free newsletter 2 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow me on instagram 3 follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 4 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 5 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 6 check out my youtube channel 7 8 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wheat-scarf-2 2 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 3 https //www instagram com/myhobbyiscrochet/ hl=de 4 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 5 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 6 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/ 7 https //www youtube com/@myhobbyiscrochetblog
